content: this peppermint candy coaster crochet pattern is so practical yet absolutely adorable with the colorful peppermint stripes it has beautiful texture and since there are only 3 rounds it works up very quickly using two different colors of #4 worsted weight cotton yarn you can create these coasters in a large array of color combinations the peppermint coaster pdf download includes the written instructions as well as a photo tutorial of over 30 pictures to help you with the link stitch and the color changes from center of coaster to edge of round 2 = 1 75 what you will need #4 cotton yarn 12 yards of white 12 yards of red 6 5 mm k yarn needle stitch key chain = chain stitch link stitch mc = magic_ring repeat = repeat round s = round s single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch yo = yarn over pattern details intermediate pattern written in us crochet terms finished size 4 across this pattern is available on my linked blog for free this pattern has been tested and tech edited but please let me know if you find any errors or if you have any questions i will do my very best to answer any questions that you may have © copyright 2022 sassy a s specialty shoppe i would be thrilled for you to sell products that you make with this pattern but please credit sass www sassyspecialtyshoppe com and tag me on social media instagram @angied_sass #sassysshoppe #peppermintcandycoaster facebook sasscrochetdesigns mewe sasscrochet please do not copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way please do not use the photographs within this pattern as they are the property of sass
